Learning Resources

Bela is designed to make it easy to get started with low-latency interaction, regardless of previous experience with electronics and coding. Our user community goes beyond engineers to include musicians, artists, audio enthusiasts, designers and more, and our online resources help everyone learn, make, and share more.

Forum

Meet our worldwide community. Ask questions, get help, and show off what you've made.

Go to Forum
Code

Bela is open source. Visit our repo to explore our software, examples library, and hardware.

Go to Code
Wiki

Find technical information, examples, circuit diagrams, as well as our Get Started Guide.

Go to Wiki
Blog

Read about Bela projects, latest developments and events, as well as how-tos and tutorials.

Go to Blog
